name: AWS Lambda
description: The Sumo Logic AWS Lambda App uses the Lambda logs via CloudWatch, CloudWatch Metrics and the CloudTrail Lambda Data Events to visualize the operational and performance trends in all the Lambda functions in your account. The preconfigured dashboards provide insights into executions such as memory and duration usage by function versions or aliases, errors, billed duration, function callers, IAM users, and threat details.

children.name: 1. AWS Lambda - Overview
children.description: The AWS Lambda - Overview dashboard provides intuitive insights with CloudWatch Lambda metrics, CloudTrail audit logs for Lambda, as well as  Lambda logs to give you an at-a-glance view of actions, performance, and health of your AWS Lambda functions.
children.title: 1. AWS Lambda - Overview

panels.title: Top IAM Users Using Lambda Functions

queries.queryString:
"lambda.amazonaws.com" "\"eventName\":\"Invoke\"" IAMUser account={{account}} Namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}}
| json "eventName", "eventSource", "awsRegion", "userAgent", "sourceIPAddress", "recipientAccountId", "userIdentity", "requestParameters", "additionalEventData" as event_name, event_source, Region, user_agent, src_ip, accountId, userIdentity, requestParameters, additionalEventData nodrop
| json field=userIdentity "type", "userName", "invokedBy", "arn" as caller_type, user_name, invoked_by, arn nodrop | json field=requestParameters "functionName", "resource" as functionname, resource nodrop | json field=additionalEventData "functionVersion" as func_version nodrop 
| where event_name = "Invoke" and caller_type = "IAMUser"
| parse regex field=functionname "\w+:\w+:\S+:[\w-]+:\S+:\S+:(?<functionname>[\S]+)$" nodrop
| parse field=resource "arn:aws:lambda:*:function:*" as f1, functionname2 nodrop
| if (isEmpty(functionname), functionname2, functionname) as functionname
| where tolowercase(functionname) matches tolowercase("{{functionname}}")
| parse regex field=func_version "\w+:\w+:\S+:[\w-]+:\S+:\S+:(?<function_version>[\S]+:[\S ]+)$" nodrop
| parse field=arn "arn:aws:*::*:*" as f1, f2, assumedroleuser nodrop
| if (isNull(user_name), invoked_by, user_name) as caller
| if (isNull(invoked_by), user_name, invoked_by) as caller
| if (isNull(caller), assumedroleuser, caller) as caller
| count as Invocations by caller
| top 10 caller by Invocations

account={{account}} region={{region}} Namespace={{namespace}} Duration
| json "message" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", message, _raw) as message
// | json "logStream", "logGroup" nodrop
| _sourceName as logStream | _sourceHost as logGroup
| parse regex field=message "REPORT\s+RequestId:\s+(?<RequestId>[^\s]+)\s+Duration:\s+(?<Duration>[^\s]+)\s+ms\s+Billed Duration:\s+(?<BilledDuration>[^\s]+)\s+ms\s+Memory\s+Size:\s+(?<MemorySize>[^\s]+)\s+MB\s+Max\s+Memory\s+Used:\s+(?<MaxMemoryUsed>[^\s]+)\s+MB" 
| parse field=loggroup "/aws/lambda/*" as functionname
| where tolowercase(functionname) matches tolowercase("{{functionname}}")
| sum(Duration) as %"Total Duration", avg(Duration) as %"Avg Duration", count as Invocations by functionname
| top 10 functionname by %"Avg Duration", %"Total Duration", Invocations
| format( "%.2f",%"Avg Duration") as %"Avg Duration"
| format( "%.2f",%"Total Duration") as %"Total Duration"

account={{account}} region={{region}} Namespace={{namespace}} Memory Used Size
| json "message" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", message, _raw) as message
// | json "logStream", "logGroup" nodrop
| _sourceName as logStream | _sourceHost as logGroup
| parse regex field=message "REPORT\s+RequestId:\s+(?<RequestId>[^\s]+)\s+Duration:\s+(?<Duration>[^\s]+)\s+ms\s+Billed Duration:\s+(?<BilledDuration>[^\s]+)\s+ms\s+Memory\s+Size:\s+(?<MemorySize>[^\s]+)\s+MB\s+Max\s+Memory\s+Used:\s+(?<MaxMemoryUsed>[^\s]+)\s+MB" 
| parse field=loggroup "/aws/lambda/*" as functionname
| where tolowercase(functionname) matches tolowercase("{{functionname}}")
| max(MaxMemoryUsed) as MaxMemoryUsed, avg(MemorySize) as AvgMemorySize by functionname
| top 10 functionname by MaxMemoryUsed, functionname asc, AvgMemorySize

(errorMessage or ERROR or CRITICAL) account={{account}} region={{region}} Namespace={{namespace}}
| json "message" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", message, _raw) as message
// | json "logStream", "logGroup" nodrop
| _sourceName as logStream | _sourceHost as logGroup
| parse field=logstream "*/[*]*" as logstreamDate, version, logstreamID
| parse field=loggroup "/aws/lambda/*" as functionname
| where tolowercase(functionname) matches tolowercase("{{functionname}}")
| parse regex field=message "^(?<time>\d[^\t]*)\t(?<RequestId>[^\t]*)\t(?<errorObj>.*)" nodrop | json field=errorObj "errorMessage" nodrop
| parse regex field=message "^(?<time>\d+\/\d+\/\d+\s+\d+:\d+:\d+):(?<logLevel>ERROR|CRITICAL):(?<errorMsg>.*)" nodrop 
| parse regex field=message "^\[(?<logLevel>ERROR|CRITICAL)]\s(?<errorMsg>.*)" nodrop
| parse regex field=message "^\[(?<logLevel>ERROR|CRITICAL)]\t(?<time>\d[^\t]*)\t(?<RequestId>[^\t]*)\t(?<errorMsg>.*)" nodrop
| parse regex field=message "^(?<logLevel>ERROR|CRITICAL) \| (?<time>.*) \| (?<thread>.*) \| (?<component>.*) \| (?<errorMsg>.*)" nodrop
| parse regex field=message "(?<errorMsg>.*HTTPError.*)" nodrop
| if (isEmpty(errorMessage), errorMsg, errorMessage) as errorMessage
| where !isEmpty(errorMessage)
| count as eventCount

account={{account}} region={{region}} Namespace={{namespace}} Memory Size Used
| json "message" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", message, _raw) as message
// | json "logStream", "logGroup" nodrop
| _sourceName as logStream | _sourceHost as logGroup
| parse regex field=message "REPORT\s+RequestId:\s+(?<RequestId>[^\s]+)\s+Duration:\s+(?<Duration>[^\s]+)\s+ms\s+Billed Duration:\s+(?<BilledDuration>[^\s]+)\s+ms\s+Memory\s+Size:\s+(?<MemorySize>[^\s]+)\s+MB\s+Max\s+Memory\s+Used:\s+(?<MaxMemoryUsed>[^\s]+)\s+MB" 
| parse field=loggroup "/aws/lambda/*" as functionname
| where tolowercase(functionname) matches tolowercase("{{functionname}}")
| avg(MemorySize) as MemorySizeAvg, avg(MaxMemoryUsed) as MaxMemoryUsedAvg by functionname
| (MemorySizeAvg - MaxMemoryUsedAvg) as RemainingMemory
| RemainingMemory/MemorySizeAvg as wastageRatio
| top 5 functionname by wastageRatio, RemainingMemory, MaxMemoryUsedAvg
| fields -wastageRatio

| json field=userIdentity "type", "userName", "invokedBy", "arn" as caller_type, user_name, invoked_by, arn nodrop | json field=requestParameters "functionName", "resource" as functionname, resource nodrop | json field=additionalEventData "functionVersion" as func_version nodrop 
| where event_name = "Invoke" and caller_type = "AWSService"
| parse regex field=functionname "\w+:\w+:\S+:[\w-]+:\S+:\S+:(?<functionname>[\S]+)$" nodrop
| parse field=resource "arn:aws:lambda:*:function:*" as f1, functionname2 nodrop
| if (isEmpty(functionname), functionname2, functionname) as functionname
| where tolowercase(functionname) matches tolowercase("{{functionname}}")
| parse regex field=func_version "\w+:\w+:\S+:[\w-]+:\S+:\S+:(?<function_version>[\S]+:[\S ]+)$" nodrop
| parse field=arn "arn:aws:*::*:*" as f1, f2, assumedroleuser nodrop
| if (isNull(user_name), invoked_by, user_name) as caller
| if (isNull(invoked_by), user_name, invoked_by) as caller
| if (isNull(caller), assumedroleuser, caller) as caller
| count as Invocations by caller
| top 10 caller by Invocations

(errorMessage or ERROR or CRITICAL) account={{account}} region={{region}} Namespace={{namespace}}
| json "message" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", message, _raw) as message
// | json "logStream", "logGroup" nodrop
| _sourceName as logStream | _sourceHost as logGroup
| parse field=logstream "*/[*]*" as logstreamDate, version, logstreamID
| parse field=loggroup "/aws/lambda/*" as functionname
| where tolowercase(functionname) matches tolowercase("{{functionname}}")
| parse regex field=message "^(?<time>\d[^\t]*)\t(?<RequestId>[^\t]*)\t(?<errorObj>.*)" nodrop | json field=errorObj "errorMessage" nodrop
| parse regex field=message "^(?<time>\d+\/\d+\/\d+\s+\d+:\d+:\d+):(?<logLevel>ERROR|CRITICAL):(?<errorMsg>.*)" nodrop 
| parse regex field=message "^\[(?<logLevel>ERROR|CRITICAL)]\s(?<errorMsg>.*)" nodrop
| parse regex field=message "^\[(?<logLevel>ERROR|CRITICAL)]\t(?<time>\d[^\t]*)\t(?<RequestId>[^\t]*)\t(?<errorMsg>.*)" nodrop
| parse regex field=message "^(?<logLevel>ERROR|CRITICAL) \| (?<time>.*) \| (?<thread>.*) \| (?<component>.*) \| (?<errorMsg>.*)" nodrop
| parse regex field=message "(?<errorMsg>.*HTTPError.*)" nodrop
| if (isEmpty(errorMessage), errorMsg, errorMessage) as errorMessage
| where !isEmpty(errorMessage)
| count as num_errors by errorMessage, functionname
| top 30 errorMessage, functionname by num_errors desc, errorMessage asc, functionname asc
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=Invocations statistic=Sum account={{account}} region={{region}} functionname={{functionname}} Resource=* | sum by account, region, namespace
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=ProvisionedConcurrencyInvocations statistic=Sum account={{account}} region={{region}} functionname={{functionname}} Resource=* | sum by account, region, namespace

panels.title: Provisioned Concurrent Executions

queries.queryString: Namespace={{namespace}} metric=ProvisionedConcurrentExecutions statistic=Average account={{account}} region={{region}} functionname={{functionname}} Resource=* | avg by account, region, namespace

panels.description: The number of events that are being processed on provisioned concurrency. For each invocation of an alias or version with provisioned concurrency, Lambda emits the current count.

panels.title: Provisioned Concurrency Utilization

queries.queryString: Namespace={{namespace}} metric=ProvisionedConcurrencyUtilization statistic=Average account={{account}} region={{region}} functionname={{functionname}} Resource=* | avg by account, region, namespace

panels.description: The number of events that are being processed on provisioned concurrency, divided by the total amount of provisioned concurrency allocated. For example, .5 indicates that 50 percent of allocated provisioned concurrency is in use. For each invocation of an alias or version with provisioned concurrency, Lambda emits the current count.

panels.title: Provisioned Concurrency Spillover Invocations

queries.queryString: Namespace={{namespace}} metric=ProvisionedConcurrencySpilloverInvocations statistic=Maximum account={{account}} region={{region}} functionname={{functionname}} Resource=* | max by account, region, namespace

panels.description: The number of invocations that are run on nonprovisioned concurrency, when all provisioned concurrency is in use. For a version or alias that is configured to use provisioned concurrency, Lambda increments the count once for each invocation that runs on non-provisioned concurrency.

queries.queryString:
"lambda.amazonaws.com" "\"eventName\":\"Invoke\"" account={{account}} Namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}} sourceIPAddress
| json "eventName", "eventSource", "awsRegion", "userAgent", "sourceIPAddress", "recipientAccountId", "userIdentity", "requestParameters", "additionalEventData" as event_name, event_source, Region, user_agent, src_ip, accountId, userIdentity, requestParameters, additionalEventData nodrop
| where event_name = "Invoke" and !(src_ip matches "*.amazonaws.com")
| json field=userIdentity "type", "userName", "invokedBy", "arn" as caller_type, user_name, invoked_by, arn nodrop | json field=requestParameters "functionName", "resource" as functionname, resource nodrop | json field=additionalEventData "functionVersion" as func_version nodrop 
| parse regex field=functionname "\w+:\w+:\S+:[\w-]+:\S+:\S+:(?<functionname>[\S]+)$" nodrop
| parse field=resource "arn:aws:lambda:*:function:*" as f1, functionname2 nodrop
| if (isEmpty(functionname), functionname2, functionname) as functionname
| parse regex field=func_version "\w+:\w+:\S+:[\w-]+:\S+:\S+:(?<function_version>[\S]+:[\S ]+)$" nodrop
| parse field=arn "arn:aws:*::*:*" as f1, f2, assumedroleuser nodrop
| where tolowercase(functionname) matches tolowercase("{{functionname}}")
| if (isNull(user_name), invoked_by, user_name) as caller
| if (isNull(invoked_by), user_name, invoked_by) as caller
| if (isNull(caller), assumedroleuser, caller) as caller
| count by src_ip
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code from geo://location on ip = src_ip
| where !isnull(latitude)

account={{account}} region={{region}} Namespace={{namespace}}
| json "message" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", message, _raw) as message
// | json "logStream", "logGroup" nodrop
| _sourceName as logStream | _sourceHost as logGroup
| parse regex field=message "REPORT\s+RequestId:\s+(?<RequestId>[^\s]+)\s+Duration:\s+(?<Duration>[^\s]+)\s+ms\s+Billed Duration:\s+(?<BilledDuration>[^\s]+)\s+ms\s+Memory\s+Size:\s+(?<MemorySize>[^\s]+)\s+MB\s+Max\s+Memory\s+Used:\s+(?<MaxMemoryUsed>[^\s]+)\s+MB" nodrop
| parse field=logstream "*/[*]*" as logstreamDate, version, logstreamID
| parse field=loggroup "/aws/lambda/*" as functionname
| where tolowercase(functionname) matches tolowercase("{{functionname}}")
| parse regex field=message "^(?<time>\d[^\t]*)\t(?<RequestId>[^\t]*)\t(?<errorObj>.*)" nodrop | json field=errorObj "errorMessage" nodrop
| parse regex field=message "^(?<time>\d+\/\d+\/\d+\s+\d+:\d+:\d+):(?<logLevel>ERROR|CRITICAL):(?<errorMsg>.*)" nodrop 
| parse regex field=message "^\[(?<logLevel>ERROR|CRITICAL)]\s(?<errorMsg>.*)" nodrop
| parse regex field=message "^\[(?<logLevel>ERROR|CRITICAL)]\t(?<time>\d[^\t]*)\t(?<RequestId>[^\t]*)\t(?<errorMsg>.*)" nodrop
| parse regex field=message "^(?<logLevel>ERROR|CRITICAL) \| (?<time>.*) \| (?<thread>.*) \| (?<component>.*) \| (?<errorMsg>.*)" nodrop
| parse regex field=message "(?<errorMsg>.*HTTPError.*)" nodrop
| if (isEmpty(errorMessage), errorMsg, errorMessage) as errorMessage
| if (!isEmpty(errorMessage), 1, 0) as haserror
| if (!isEmpty(errorMessage), 0, 1) as noerror
| sum(haserror) as failures, sum(noerror) as successes by functionname
| top 10 functionname by failures, successes

account={{account}} region={{region}} Namespace={{namespace}}
| json "message" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", message, _raw) as message
// | json "logStream", "logGroup" nodrop
| _sourceName as logStream | _sourceHost as logGroup
| parse regex field=message "REPORT\s+RequestId:\s+(?<RequestId>[^\s]+)\s+Duration:\s+(?<Duration>[^\s]+)\s+ms\s+Billed Duration:\s+(?<BilledDuration>[^\s]+)\s+ms\s+Memory\s+Size:\s+(?<MemorySize>[^\s]+)\s+MB\s+Max\s+Memory\s+Used:\s+(?<MaxMemoryUsed>[^\s]+)\s+MB" 
| parse field=logstream "*/[*]*" as logstreamDate,version,logstreamID
| parse field=loggroup "/aws/lambda/*" as functionname 
| where tolowercase(functionname) matches tolowercase("{{functionname}}")
| count by functionname, version
| transpose row functionname column version

"lambda.amazonaws.com" account={{account}} Namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}} eventName
| json "eventName", "eventSource", "awsRegion", "userAgent", "sourceIPAddress", "recipientAccountId", "userIdentity", "requestParameters", "additionalEventData" as event_name, event_source, Region, user_agent, src_ip, accountId, userIdentity, requestParameters, additionalEventData nodrop
| json field=userIdentity "type", "userName", "invokedBy", "arn" as caller_type, user_name, invoked_by, arn nodrop | json field=requestParameters "functionName", "resource" as functionname, resource nodrop | json field=additionalEventData "functionVersion" as func_version nodrop 
| parse regex field=functionname "\w+:\w+:\S+:[\w-]+:\S+:\S+:(?<functionname>[\S]+)$" nodrop
| parse field=resource "arn:aws:lambda:*:function:*" as f1, functionname2 nodrop
| if (isEmpty(functionname), functionname2, functionname) as functionname
| where tolowercase(functionname) matches tolowercase("{{functionname}}")
| parse regex field=func_version "\w+:\w+:\S+:[\w-]+:\S+:\S+:(?<function_version>[\S]+:[\S ]+)$" nodrop
| parse field=arn "arn:aws:*::*:*" as f1, f2, assumedroleuser nodrop
| if (isNull(user_name), invoked_by, user_name) as caller
| if (isNull(invoked_by), user_name, invoked_by) as caller
| if (isNull(caller), assumedroleuser, caller) as caller
| count as count by functionname, event_name | sort by count, functionname, event_name | limit 20

panels.title: Top Functions by Cold Start Duration (ms)

queries.queryString:
account={{account}} region={{region}} Namespace={{namespace}}  "init duration"
| json "message" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", message, _raw) as message
// | json "logStream", "logGroup" nodrop
| _sourceName as logStream | _sourceHost as logGroup
| parse field=message  "REPORT RequestId: *\tDuration: * ms\tBilled Duration: * ms\tMemory Size: * MB\tMax Memory Used: * MB\tInit Duration: * ms" as reqId, duration, bill_duration, mem_total, mem_used, initDur 
| parse field=logstream "*/[*]*" as logstreamDate,version,logstreamID
| parse field=loggroup "/aws/lambda/*" as functionname
| where tolowercase(functionname) matches tolowercase("{{functionname}}")
| avg(initDur) as initDuration by functionname
| sort by initDuration,functionname
| limit 20

children.name: 1. AWS Lambda - Request Analysis
children.description: The AWS Lambda - Request Analysis dashboard provides deeper insights into the invocations and performance of your AWS Lambda functions.
children.title: 1. AWS Lambda - Request Analysis

panels.title: Invocations Trend and Cold Starts Trend

queries.queryString: Namespace={{namespace}} metric=Invocations statistic=Sum account={{account}} region={{region}} functionname={{functionname}} Resource=* | avg by functionname, namespace, region, account
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=Invocations statistic=Sum account={{account}} region={{region}} functionname=* Resource=* | avg

account={{account}} region={{region}} Namespace={{namespace}}  "init duration"
| json "message" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", message, _raw) as message
// | json "logStream", "logGroup" nodrop
| _sourceName as logStream | _sourceHost as logGroup
| parse field=message  "REPORT RequestId: *\tDuration: * ms\tBilled Duration: * ms\tMemory Size: * MB\tMax Memory Used: * MB\tInit Duration: * ms" as reqId, duration, bill_duration, mem_total, mem_used, initDur 
| parse field=logstream "*/[*]*" as logstreamDate,version,logstreamID
| parse field=loggroup "/aws/lambda/*" as functionname
| where tolowercase(functionname) matches tolowercase("{{functionname}}")
| timeslice 5m 
| count by functionname, _timeslice
| fillmissing timeslice (5m) in _timeslice, values all in functionname
| transpose row _timeslice column functionname

panels.title: Function Duration and Cold Start Duration (ms)

queries.queryString:
account={{account}} region={{region}} Namespace={{namespace}} Duration
| json "message" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", message, _raw) as message
| _sourceName as logStream | _sourceHost as logGroup
| parse regex field=message "REPORT\s+RequestId:\s+(?<RequestId>[^\s]+)\s+Duration:\s+(?<Duration>[^\s]+)\s+ms\s+Billed Duration:\s+(?<BilledDuration>[^\s]+)\s+ms\s+Memory\s+Size:\s+(?<MemorySize>[^\s]+)\s+MB\s+Max\s+Memory\s+Used:\s+(?<MaxMemoryUsed>[^\s]+)\s+MB" 
| parse field=logstream "*/[*]*" as logstreamDate,version,logstreamID
| parse field=loggroup "/aws/lambda/*" as functionname
| where tolowercase(functionname) matches tolowercase("{{functionname}}")
| timeslice 15m
| sum(Duration) as Duration by functionname, _timeslice
| transpose row _timeslice column functionname

account={{account}} region={{region}} Namespace={{namespace}}  "init duration"
| json "message" nodrop | if (_raw matches "{*", message, _raw) as message
// | json "logStream", "logGroup" nodrop
| _sourceName as logStream | _sourceHost as logGroup
| parse field=message  "REPORT RequestId: *\tDuration: * ms\tBilled Duration: * ms\tMemory Size: * MB\tMax Memory Used: * MB\tInit Duration: * ms" as reqId, duration, bill_duration, mem_total, mem_used, initDur 
| parse field=logstream "*/[*]*" as logstreamDate,version,logstreamID
| parse field=loggroup "/aws/lambda/*" as functionname
| where tolowercase(functionname) matches tolowercase("{{functionname}}")
| timeslice 5m
| avg(initDur) as initDuration by functionname, _timeslice
| transpose row _timeslice column functionname

| parse regex field=functionname "\w+:\w+:\S+:[\w-]+:\S+:\S+:(?<functionname>[\S]+)$" nodrop
| parse field=resource "arn:aws:lambda:*:function:*" as f1, functionname2 nodrop
| if (isEmpty(functionname), functionname2, functionname) as functionname
| where tolowercase(functionname) matches tolowercase("{{functionname}}")
| parse regex field=func_version "\w+:\w+:\S+:[\w-]+:\S+:\S+:(?<function_version>[\S]+:[\S ]+)$" nodrop
| parse field=arn "arn:aws:*::*:*" as f1, f2, assumedroleuser nodrop
| if (isNull(user_name), invoked_by, user_name) as caller
| if (isNull(invoked_by), user_name, invoked_by) as caller
| if (isNull(caller), assumedroleuser, caller) as caller
| count as today by user_agent
| compare with timeshift 1d as yesterday
| today_yesterday as yesterday
| sort by today, yesterday
| fields -today_yesterday

children.description: AWS Lambda - Performance Trends dashboard displays log data analytics to provide insights on memory usage, function duration, recent request details, and compute usage.
children.title: 5. AWS Lambda - Performance Trends

queries.queryString: Namespace={{namespace}} metric=Duration Statistic=Average account={{account}} region={{region}} functionname={{functionname}} Resource=* | avg by functionname, namespace, region, account
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=Duration Statistic=Average account={{account}} region={{region}} functionname=* | avg

panels.title: Note:
panels.text:
Concurrent Executions: This shows you the concurrent executions at an account level, and for any function with a custom concurrency limit. Both graphs will be same if none of the functions are configured with concurrency limit. Not applicable for versions or aliases.

UnreservedConcurrentExecutions: This shows you the total concurrent executions for functions assigned to the default unreserved concurrency pool. Not applicable for functions, versions, or aliases.

Invocations vs Errors vs Throttle: It's important to distinguish between an invocation request and an actual invocation. It is possible for the error rate to exceed the number of billed Lambda function invocations. Lambda reports an invocation metric only if the Lambda function code is executed. If the invocation request yields a throttling or other initialization error that prevents the Lambda function code from being invoked, Lambda will report an error, but it does not log an invocation metric.

| where tolowercase(functionname) matches tolowercase("{{functionname}}")
| timeslice 10m
| sum(BilledDuration) as BilledDuration by _timeslice
| predict BilledDuration by 10m model=ar, forecast=18
| fields - BilledDuration_error, BilledDuration_linear

"lambda.amazonaws.com" account={{account}} Namespace={{namespace}} region={{region}} sourceIPAddress

| parse regex field=functionname "\w+:\w+:\S+:[\w-]+:\S+:\S+:(?<functionname>[\S]+)$" nodrop
